item.title: SQL Tips
item.description: Check if a column contains a string SELECT [DatabaseId] ,[Category] FROM [dbo].[SomeTable] Where Category LIKE '%theString%' Run a sql command multiple times INSERT INTO [dbo].[SomeTable] ( Type, Message, Time ) VALUES ( 'some type',' some message', '2022-04-27 09:51:22.0000000 +01:00' ) GO 10000000
